automation_yaml:
id: office_wled_random_burst_every_15
alias: Office WLED - Random Burst Every 15 Minutes
description: "Every 15 minutes, temporarily take over the Office WLED for a 15-second random show at 100% brightness, then restore its previous state."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: "/15"
conditions: []
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_burst
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 100
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      effect: "Random"
  - delay: "00:00:15"
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_burst

issues.recommendation: Verify entity scene.office_wled_before_burst exists in Home Assistant. This entity was not validated during generation - consider using a validated entity instead.

warnings.recommendation: Verify entity scene.office_wled_before_burst exists in Home Assistant. This entity was not validated during generation - consider using a validated entity instead.
